title: Font from Real Simple Magazine
content:
I want to know what this italic font is, it seems like it would be either Hercules Italic or Worldwide Italic. However, the "k" and the "r" are not the same. Is there a similar one it could be?

There's a picture below, and more pictures of the font with additional letters at this Pinterest board: [http://www.pinterest.com/realsimple/daily-thoughts-inspiration/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830190236/http:/www.pinterest.com/realsimple/daily-thoughts-inspiration/ "http://www.pinterest.com/realsimple/daily-thoughts-inspiration/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830190236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/simplyfont_4273.jpg)
author: kalee11
